# Invoice.wiki

> Free online invoice generator that creates professional PDF invoices instantly with VAT calculations, multi-currency support, and complete privacy - no registration required.

Invoice.wiki is a browser-based invoice generation tool designed for freelancers, small businesses, and entrepreneurs. All invoice processing happens locally in your browser for maximum security and privacy. The platform supports 40+ currencies, automatic VAT calculations, customizable colors and languages (English, German, Czech, Polish, Slovak, Ukrainian).

Key features:
- Instant PDF generation with professional formatting
- Automatic VAT and tax calculations with precision rounding
- Multi-currency support with proper formatting
- Complete privacy - no data stored on servers
- No registration or login required
- Customizable invoice colors and languages
- Mobile-responsive design
